mapper.insert: insert into comment_table1(commentWriter, commentContents, boardId) values (#{commentWriter}, #{commentContents}, #{boardId})
mapper.select: select commentId, commentWriter, commentContents, date_format(commentCreatedDate, "%y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as commentCreatedDate, boardId from comment_table1 where boardId = #{boardId} order by commentId desc
